ad.tests package¶

Submodules¶

ad.tests.test_forms module¶

This program will use unittest to test ad app’s forms.py.

class ad.tests.test_forms.TestForms(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

This is a conceptual Unittest child case class for testing forms.py. :param SimpleTestCase: It inherits built-in child functionalities of django unittest, which handels all test cases. :type SimpleTestCase: functions

test_AdStudentForm_no_data()¶

This will test the AdStudentForm form with invalid/blank input. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the forms field. :rtype: assertEqual , bool

test_AdStudentForm_valid_data()¶

This will test the AdStudentForm form with valid input. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the forms field. :rtype: assertEqual , bool

test_AdTutorForm_no_data()¶

This will test the AdTutorForm form with invalid/blank input. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the forms field. :rtype: assertEqual , bool

test_AdTutorForm_valid_data()¶

This will test the AdTutorForm form with valid input. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the forms field. :rtype: assertEqual , bool

ad.tests.test_models module¶

This program will use unittest to test ad app’s models.py

class ad.tests.test_models.TestModels(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

This is a conceptual Unittest child case class for testing models.py. :param TestCase: It inherits built-in child functionalities of django unittest, which handels all test cases. :type SimpleTestCase: functions

setUp()¶

This will create some objects of student ad model and tutor ad model. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: object :return: returns object to check models are working properly. :rtype: object

test_model_object_student()¶

This will test all the objects of student ad model. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: int :return: returns a request to check the title value. :rtype: assertEqual , bool

test_model_object_tutor()¶

This will test all the objects of tutor ad model. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: int :return: returns a request to check the title value. :rtype: assertEqual , bool

test_model_string_student()¶

This will test the __str__ function to store student ad title. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: string :return: returns a request to check the title value. :rtype: assertEqual , bool

test_model_string_tutor()¶

This will test the __str__ function to store tutor ad title. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: string :return: returns a request to check the title value. :rtype: assertEqual , bool

ad.tests.test_urls module¶

This program will use unittest to test ad app’s urls.py

class ad.tests.test_urls.TestUrls(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.SimpleTestCase

This is a conceptual Unittest child case for testing urls.py. :param SimpleTestCase: It inherits built-in child functionalities of django unittest, which handels all test cases. :type SimpleTestCase: functions

test_find_student_url_is_resolved()¶

This will test the find_tutor url. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the url pattern. :rtype: assertEqual resolve, url

test_find_tutor_url_is_resolved()¶

This will test the find_tutor url. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the url pattern. :rtype: assertEqual resolve, url

test_home_url_is_resolved()¶

This will test the home url. :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the url pattern. :rtype: assertEqual resolve, url

ad.tests.test_views module¶

This program will use unittest to test ad app’s views.py

class ad.tests.test_views.TestViews(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

This is a conceptual Unittest child case class for testing views.py. :param TestCase: It inherits built-in child functionalities of django unittest, which handels all test cases. :type TestCase: functions

test_find_student_get()¶

This will test the find_student view with proper request . :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the template via view. :rtype: assertEqual, resolve url, bool

test_find_tutor_get()¶

This will test the find_tutor view with proper request . :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the template via view. :rtype: assertEqual, resolve url, bool

test_home_get()¶

This will test the home view with proper request . :param self: Takes the self content and pass. :type self: Boolean :return: returns a request to check the template via view. :rtype: assertEqual, resolve url, bool
